instructions:
Tõlgi järgmised atribuudinimed ja -väärtused eesti keelde.

                            Oluline:
                            - Arvesta toote iseloomu ja kogu läbitöödeldud konteksti (pealkiri, kirjeldus, SEO päringud, KKK), et tõlge vastaks toote tegelikele omadustele.
                            - Säilita mõõtühikud õigel kujul (cm, mm, L, W, V jne) ja arvväärtused; kasuta korrektselt eestikeelseid käändeid ja idiomaatilist sõnajärge.
                            - Ära lisa uusi tähendusi ega väärtusi; tõlgi ainult antud nimesid ja väärtusi.
                            - Iga translation-objekt PEAB sisaldama ka "attr_name" välja. Kui kind == "name", siis kasuta attr_name = source.

                            Tagasta täpselt skeemiga { translations: [ { kind: 'name'|'value', source: string, translated: string, attr_name?: string } ] }.
input: {"items": [{"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Producer", "source": "Samsung"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Type of refrigeration technology", "source": "Full no frost"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Height", "source": "177.5"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Depth", "source": "55.0"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Control", "source": "External electronic control"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Annual energy consumption", "source": "231"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Net capacity of refrigerator", "source": "231"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Net capacity of freezer", "source": "74"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Rapid cooling in refrigerator", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Number of freezer boxes/shelfs", "source": "2"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Freezer freezing temperature", "source": "-15°C - - 23°C"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Maximum freezer storage time in power failure", "source": "6"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Fully removable drawers and intermediate glass shelves in freezer", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Open door signal", "source": "No"}]}
